summary.span: 使用用户定义的模板显示数据源中单个记录的值。

span.span: Displays the values of a single record from a data source using user-defined templates.

summary.span: 控件可用于编辑、删除和插入记录。

span.span: The control allows you to edit, delete, and insert records.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [模板Templates](#templates) - [绑定到数据Binding to Data](#binding_to_data) - [数据操作Data Operations](#data_operations) - [自定义用户界面Customizing the User Interface](#customizing_the_user_interface) - [事件Events](#events) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#accessibility) - [应用 CSS 样式Applying CSS Styles](#applying_styles) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件用于显示数据源中的单个记录。The control is used to display a single record from a data source. 它类似于 控件，只不过它显示用户定义的模板而不是行字段。It is similar to the control, except it displays user-defined templates instead of row fields. 创建自己的模板使你可以更灵活地控制数据的显示方式。Creating your own templates gives you greater flexibility in controlling how the data is displayed. 控件支持以下功能：The control supports the following features: - 绑定到数据源控件，例如 和 。Binding to data source controls, such as and . - 内置插入功能。Built-in inserting capabilities. - 内置的更新和删除功能。Built-in updating and deleting capabilities. - 内置的分页功能。Built-in paging capabilities. - 以编程方式访问 对象模型，以动态设置属性、处理事件等。Programmatic access to the object model to dynamically set properties, handle events, and so on. - 通过用户定义的模板、主题和样式可自定义外观。Customizable appearance through user-defined templates, themes, and styles. ## 模板Templates 要使 控件显示内容，需要为控件的不同部分创建模板。For the control to display content, you need to create templates for the different parts of the control. 大多数模板是可选的;但是，您必须为在其中配置控件的模式创建模板。Most templates are optional; however, you must create a template for the mode in which the control is configured. 例如， 支持插入记录的控件必须定义插入项模板。For example, a control that supports inserting records must have an insert item template defined. 下表列出了你可以创建的不同模板。The following table lists the different templates that you can create. |模板类型Template type|说明Description| |-------------------|-----------------| ||定义当 控件处于编辑模式时数据行的内容。Defines the content for the data row when the control is in edit mode. 此模板通常包含输入控件和命令按钮，用户可以使用这些按钮编辑现有记录。This template usually contains input controls and command buttons with which the user can edit an existing record.| ||定义当 控件绑定到不包含任何记录的数据源时所显示的空数据行的内容。Defines the content for the empty data row displayed when the control is bound to a data source that does not contain any records. 此模板通常包含用于向用户发出警报，指出数据源不包含任何记录的内容。This template usually contains content to alert the user that the data source does not contain any records.| ||定义脚注行的内容。Defines the content for the footer row. 此模板通常包含希望在页脚行中显示的任何其他内容。This template usually contains any additional content you would like to display in the footer row. **注意：** 作为替代方法，您可以通过设置属性来指定要在脚注行中显示的文本 。**Note:** As an alternative, you can simply specify text to display in the footer row by setting the property.| ||定义标题行的内容。Defines the content for the header row. 此模板通常包含你希望在标题行中显示的任何其他内容。This template usually contains any additional content you would like to display in the header row. **注意：** 作为替代方法，只需通过设置属性来指定要在标题行中显示的文本 。**Note:** As an alternative, you can simply specify text to display in the header row by setting the property.| ||当控件处于只读模式时，定义数据行的内容 。Defines the content for the data row when the control is in read-only mode. 此模板通常包含用于显示现有记录的值的内容。This template usually contains content to display the values of an existing record.| ||定义数据行 在控件处于插入模式时的内容。Defines the content for the data row when the control is in insert mode. 此模板通常包含用户可用于添加新记录的输入控件和命令按钮。This template usually contains input controls and command buttons with which the user can add a new record.| ||定义在 将属性设置为) 时， (启用分页功能时显示的页导航行的内容 `true` 。Defines the content for the pager row displayed when the paging feature is enabled (when the property is set to `true`). 此模板通常包含用户可在其中导航到另一记录的控件。This template usually contains controls with which the user can navigate to another record. **注意：** 控件具有内置的页导航行用户界面 (UI) 。**Note:** The control has a built-in pager row user interface (UI). 仅当想要创建自己的自定义页导航行时，才需要创建页导航模板。You need to create a pager template only if you want to create your own custom pager row.| 若要在项模板中显示某个字段的值，请使用数据绑定表达式。To display the value of a field in an item template, use a data binding expression. 有关数据绑定表达式的详细信息，请参阅 [数据绑定表达式语法](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/676beb1d-ddfa-4153-bba8-3c86dcb7ceca)。For more information on data binding expressions, see [Data-Binding Expression Syntax](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/676beb1d-ddfa-4153-bba8-3c86dcb7ceca). 编辑项模板和插入项模板中的输入控件可以通过使用双向绑定表达式绑定到数据源的字段。Input controls in the edit item template and insert item template can be bound to the fields of a data source by using a two-way binding expression. 这允许 控件自动提取用于更新或插入操作的输入控件的值。This allows the control to automatically extract the values of the input control for an update or insert operation. 双向绑定表达式还允许编辑项模板中的输入控件自动显示原始字段值。Two-way binding expressions also allow input controls in an edit item template to automatically display the original field values. 有关双向绑定表达式的详细信息，请参阅 [绑定到数据库](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178361(v=vs.100))。For more information on two-way binding expressions, see [Binding to Databases](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178361(v=vs.100)). ## 绑定到数据Binding to Data 控件可以绑定到数据源控件 (如 、 或 ) 或实现接口的任何数据源集合 ，如 、 、 或其他集合类型。The control can be bound to a data source control (such as , , or ) or to any data source collection that implements the interface, such as , , , or other collection types. 使用以下方法之一将 控件绑定到相应的数据源类型：Use one of the following methods to bind the control to the appropriate data source type: - 若要绑定到数据源控件，请将 控件的属性设置 为 数据源控件的值。To bind to a data source control, set the property of the control to the value of the data source control. 控件将自动绑定到指定的数据源控件，并可以利用数据源控件的功能来执行插入、更新、删除和分页功能。The control automatically binds to the specified data source control and can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities to perform inserting, updating, deleting, and paging functionality. 这是绑定到数据的首选方法。This is the preferred method to bind to data. - 若要绑定到实现接口的数据源 ，请以编程方式将 控件的属性设置 为数据源，然后调用 方法。To bind to a data source that implements the interface, programmatically set the property of the control to the data source and then call the method. 使用此方法时， 控件不提供内置的插入、更新、删除和分页功能。When using this method, the control does not provide built-in inserting, updating, deleting, and paging functionality. 需要使用相应的事件来提供此功能。You need to provide this functionality by using the appropriate event. 有关数据绑定的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET 数据访问内容映射](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/6759sth4(v=vs.100))。For more information on data binding, see [ASP.NET Data Access Content Map](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/6759sth4(v=vs.100)). > [!NOTE] > 此控件可用于显示用户输入，其中可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 在应用程序中显示可执行脚本、SQL 语句或其他代码之前，请检查从该客户端发送的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 在此控件中显示值之前，强烈建议尽可能使用 HTML 编码值。Whenever possible, it is strongly recommended that values are HTML-encoded before they are displayed in this control. ASP.NET 提供输入请求验证功能来阻止用户输入中的脚本和 HTML。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 还提供验证服务器控件以评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [验证控件简介](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/2e4hd649(v=vs.85))。For more information, see [Introduction to the Validation Controls](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/2e4hd649(v=vs.85)). ## 数据操作Data Operations 控件提供了许多内置功能，使用户可以对控件中的项进行更新、删除、插入和分页。The control provides many built-in capabilities that allow the user to update, delete, insert, and page through items in the control. 当 控件绑定到数据源控件时， 控件可以利用数据源控件的功能，并提供自动更新、删除、插入和分页功能。When the control is bound to a data source control, the control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic updating, deleting, inserting, and paging functionality. > [!NOTE] > 控件可以为与其他类型的数据源的更新、删除、插入和分页操作提供支持; 但是，您必须为这些操作的实现提供相应的事件处理程序。The control can provide support for update, delete, insert, and paging operations with other types of data sources; however, you must provide an appropriate event handler with the implementation for these operations. 由于 控件使用模板，因此它不提供自动生成命令按钮以执行更新、删除或插入操作的方法。Because the control uses templates, it does not provide a way to automatically generate command buttons to perform updating, deleting, or inserting operations. 您必须在适当的模板中手动包含这些命令按钮。You must manually include these command buttons in the appropriate template. 控件识别某些按钮的 `CommandName` 属性设置为特定值的按钮。The control recognizes certain buttons that have their `CommandName` properties set to specific values. 下表列出了控件识别的命令按钮 。The following table lists the command buttons that the control recognizes. |ButtonButton|CommandName 值CommandName value|说明Description| |------------|-----------------------|-----------------| |取消Cancel|退出"Cancel"|在更新或插入操作中用于取消操作并丢弃用户输入的值。Used in updating or inserting operations to cancel the operation and to discard the values entered by the user. 然后，该 控件返回到由属性指定的模式 。The control then returns to the mode specified by the property.| |删除Delete|“Delete”"Delete"|用于删除操作以从数据源中删除所显示的记录。Used in deleting operations to delete the displayed record from the data source. 引发 和 事件。Raises the and events.| |编辑Edit|编辑"Edit"|用于更新操作，使 控件处于编辑模式。Used in updating operations to put the control in edit mode. 为数据行显示在属性中指定的内容 。The content specified in the property is displayed for the data row.| |插入Insert|&"Insert"|在插入操作中用于尝试使用用户提供的值在数据源中插入新记录。Used in inserting operations to attempt to insert a new record in the data source using the values provided by the user. 引发 和 事件。Raises the and events.| |新建New|新西兰"New"|在插入操作中用于将 控件置于插入模式中。Used in inserting operations to put the control in insert mode. 为数据行显示在属性中指定的内容 。The content specified in the property is displayed for the data row.| |页面Page|分页"Page"|用于在分页操作中表示执行分页的页导航行中的按钮。Used in paging operations to represent a button in the pager row that performs paging. 若要指定分页操作，请将 `CommandArgument` 按钮的属性设置为 "下一步"、"上一步"、"First"、"Last" 或要导航到的页面的索引。To specify the paging operation, set the `CommandArgument` property of the button to "Next", "Prev", "First", "Last", or the index of the page to which to navigate. 引发 和 事件。Raises the and events. **注意：** 此类型的按钮通常仅在页导航模板中使用。**Note:** This type of button is typically used only in the pager template.| |更新Update|时更新"Update"|用于更新操作，尝试使用用户提供的值更新数据源中显示的记录。Used in updating operations to attempt to update the displayed record in the data source with the values provided by the user. 引发 和 事件。Raises the and events.| 与 "删除" 按钮 (会立即删除显示的记录) 在单击 "编辑" 或 "新建" 按钮时， 控件将分别进入 "编辑" 或 "插入" 模式。Unlike the Delete button (which deletes the displayed record immediately), when the Edit or New button is clicked, the control goes into edit or insert mode, respectively. 在编辑模式下，将显示当前数据项的属性中包含的内容 。In edit mode, the content contained in the property is displayed for the current data item. 通常，编辑项模板的定义使 "编辑" 按钮替换为更新和 "取消" 按钮。Typically, the edit item template is defined such that the Edit button is replaced with an Update and a Cancel button. 适用于字段的数据类型的输入控件 (例如， 或 控件) 通常还显示一个字段值，供用户修改。Input controls that are appropriate for the field's data type (such as a or a control) are also usually displayed with a field's value for the user to modify. 单击 "更新" 按钮将更新数据源中的记录，而单击 "取消" 按钮将放弃所有更改。Clicking the Update button updates the record in the data source, while clicking the Cancel button abandons any changes. 同样， 当控件处于插入模式时，将为数据项显示该属性中包含的内容。Likewise, the content contained in the property is displayed for the data item when the control is in insert mode. 插入项模板通常定义为：将 "新建" 按钮替换为 "插入" 和 "取消" 按钮，并为用户显示空输入控件以输入新记录的值。The insert item template is typically defined such that the New button is replaced with an Insert and a Cancel button, and empty input controls are displayed for the user to enter the values for the new record. 单击 "插入" 按钮将插入数据源中的记录，而单击 "取消" 按钮将放弃所有更改。Clicking the Insert button inserts the record in the data source, while clicking the Cancel button abandons any changes. 控件提供分页功能，该功能允许用户导航到数据源中的其他记录。The control provides a paging feature, which allows the user to navigate to other records in the data source. 启用后，页导航行显示在 包含页面导航控件的控件中。When enabled, a pager row is displayed in the control that contains the page navigation controls. 若要启用分页，请将 属性设置为 `true` 。To enable paging, set the property to `true`. 您可以通过设置和属性中包含的对象的属性来自定义页导航行 。You can customize the pager row by setting the properties of objects contained in the and the property. 您可以使用属性来创建自己的 UI，而不是使用内置的页导航行 UI 。Instead of using the built-in pager row UI, you can create your own UI by using the property. ## 自定义用户界面Customizing the User Interface 您可以 通过设置控件的不同部分的样式属性来自定义控件的外观。You can customize the appearance of the control by setting the style properties for the different parts of the control. 下表列出了不同的样式属性。The following table lists the different style properties. |Style 属性Style property|说明Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||控件处于编辑模式时数据行的样式设置 。The style settings for the data row when the control is in edit mode.| ||当数据源不包含任何记录时，控件中显示的空数据行的样式设置。The style settings for the empty data row displayed in the control when the data source does not contain any records.| ||控件的脚注行的样式设置 。The style settings for the footer row of the control.| ||控件的标题行的样式设置 。The style settings for the header row of the control.| ||控件处于插入模式时数据行的样式设置 。The style settings for the data row when the control is in insert mode.| ||启用分页功能时显示在控件中的页导航行的样式设置 。The style settings for the pager row displayed in the control when the paging feature is enabled.| ||控件处于只读模式时数据行的样式设置 。The style settings for the data row when the control is in read-only mode.| ## 事件Events 控件提供了几个可对其进行编程的事件。The control provides several events that you can program against. 这使您可以在每次发生事件时运行自定义例程。This allows you to run a custom routine whenever an event occurs. 下表列出了控件支持的事件 。The following table lists the events supported by the control. |事件Event|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||在单击 控件中的某个按钮时发生。Occurs when a button within a control is clicked. 此事件通常用于在控件中单击按钮时执行任务。This event is often used to perform a task when a button is clicked in the control.| ||在控件中创建所有对象之后发生 。Occurs after all objects are created in the control. 此事件通常用于在记录显示之前修改记录的值。This event is often used to modify the values of a record before it is displayed.| ||在单击 "删除" 按钮 (按钮 `CommandName` 设置为 "Delete" ) 的按钮时，但在 控件从数据源中删除记录之后发生。Occurs when a Delete button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Delete") is clicked, but after the control deletes the record from the data source. 此事件通常用于检查删除操作的结果。This event is often used to check the results of the delete operation.| ||在单击 "删除" 按钮时，但在 控件从数据源中删除记录之前发生。Occurs when a Delete button is clicked, but before the control deletes the record from the data source. 此事件通常用于取消删除操作。This event is often used to cancel the delete operation.| ||在单击 "插入" 按钮 (按钮，该按钮的 `CommandName` 属性设置为 "插入" ) 时，但在 控件插入记录后发生。Occurs when an Insert button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Insert") is clicked, but after the control inserts the record. 此事件通常用于检查插入操作的结果。This event is often used to check the results of the insert operation.| ||当单击 "插入" 按钮时，但在 控件插入记录之前发生。Occurs when an Insert button is clicked, but before the control inserts the record. 此事件通常用于取消插入操作。This event is often used to cancel the insert operation.| ||在单击 "更新" 按钮 (其 `CommandName` 属性设置为 "Update" ) 的按钮时，但在 控件更新行后发生。Occurs when an Update button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Update") is clicked, but after the control updates the row. 此事件通常用于检查更新操作的结果。This event is often used to check the results of the update operation.| ||当单击 "更新" 按钮时，但在 控件更新记录之前发生。Occurs when an Update button is clicked, but before the control updates the record. 此事件通常用于取消更新操作。This event is often used to cancel the update operation.| ||在 控件更改模式 (更改为 "编辑"、"插入" 或 "只读" 模式) 之后发生。Occurs after the control changes modes (to edit, insert, or read-only mode). 此事件通常用于在控件更改模式时执行任务 。This event is often used to perform a task when the control changes modes.| ||在 控件更改模式 () 的编辑、插入或只读模式之前发生。Occurs before the control changes modes (to edit, insert, or read-only mode). 此事件通常用于取消模式更改。This event is often used to cancel a mode change.| ||在单击某一页导航按钮时，但在 控件处理分页操作之后发生。Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but after the control handles the paging operation. 此事件通常在用户导航至控件中的其他记录后需要执行任务时使用。This event is commonly used when you need to perform a task after the user navigates to a different record in the control.| ||在单击某一页导航按钮时，但在 控件处理分页操作之前发生。Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but before the control handles the paging operation. 此事件通常用于取消分页操作。This event is often used to cancel the paging operation.| ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件以生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息，请参阅 [Visual Studio 中的辅助功能和 ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms228004(v=vs.140)) 和 [ASP.NET 控件和辅助功能](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140))。For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms228004(v=vs.140)) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140)). ## 应用 CSS 样式Applying CSS Styles 控件使您可以在标记中指定 CSS 样式规则。The control lets you specify CSS style rules in markup. 如果使用模板来自定义控件的外观 ，则可以在模板的标记中指定 CSS 样式。If you use templates to customize the appearance of the control, you can specify CSS styles in the markup in the templates. 在这种情况下，不需要额外的外部表。In that case, no extra outer table is required. 您可以通过将属性设置为来阻止呈现该表 `false` 。You can prevent the table from being rendered by setting the property to `false`. ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                                                                                                                                       ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 控件显示控件中的值 。The following example demonstrates how to use a control to display the values from a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件具有内置分页功能，使用户可以导航到数据源中的其他记录。The control has built-in paging capabilities, which allow a user to navigate to a different record in the data source. 分页功能可与支持接口的任何数据源对象 或支持分页功能的数据源一起使用。The paging feature can be used with any data source object that supports the interface or a data source that supports paging capability. 若要启用分页功能，请将 属性设置为 `true` 。To enable the paging feature, set the property to `true`. 可以通过使用属性来确定基础数据源中的总项数 。You can determine the total number of items in the underlying data source by using the property. 若要确定当前显示项的索引，请使用 属性。To determine the index of the currently displayed item, use the property. 启用分页时，会自动在控件中显示一个名为 "页导航行" 的附加行 。When paging is enabled, an additional row called the pager row is automatically displayed in the control. 页导航行包含页面导航控件，可以显示在控件的顶部和底部，或者同时显示在控件的顶部和底部。The pager row contains the page navigation controls and can be displayed at the top, bottom, or both the top and bottom of the control. 页导航行具有四个内置的页导航显示模式。The pager row has four built-in pager display modes. 下表描述了这四种模式。The following table describes the four modes. |“模式”Mode|说明Description| |----------|-----------------| |`PagerButton.NextPrevious`|一组由 "上一页" 和 "下一页" 按钮组成的分页控件。A set of pagination controls consisting of previous and next buttons.| |`PagerButton.NextPreviousFirstLast`|由 "上一个"、"下一步"、"上一步" 和 "最后一个" 按钮组成A set of pagination controls consisting of previous, next, first, and last buttons.| |`PagerButton.Numeric`|一组由用于直接访问页的带编号的链接按钮组成的分页控件。A set of pagination controls consisting of numbered link buttons to access pages directly. 这是默认模式。This is the default mode.| |`PagerButton.NumericFirstLast`|一组由编号和第一个和最后一个链接按钮组成的分页控件。A set of pagination controls consisting of numbered and first and last link buttons.| > [!NOTE] > 当数据源包含的记录少于两条时，控件将自动隐藏页导航行。The control automatically hides the pager row when the data source contains fewer than two records. 您可以通过使用属性来控制页导航行 (如页导航显示模式、一次显示的页链接的数量，以及页导航控件的文本标签) 。You can control the settings of the pager row (such as the pager display mode, the number of page links to display at a time, and the pager control's text label) by using the property. 若要控制页导航行的外观 (包括其背景色和字体颜色) ，请使用 属性。To control the appearance of the pager row (including its background color and font color), use the property. 控件还允许您为页导航行定义自定义模板。The control also allows you to define a custom template for the pager row. 有关创建自定义页导航行模板的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information on creating a custom pager row template, see . 控件提供若干事件，可用于在进行分页时执行自定义操作。The control provides several events that you can use to perform a custom action when paging occurs. 下表列出了可用的事件。The following table lists the available events. |事件Event|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||在单击某一页导航按钮时，但在 控件处理分页操作之后发生。Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but after the control handles the paging operation. 此事件通常在用户导航至控件中的其他记录后需要执行任务时使用。This event is commonly used when you need to perform a task after the user navigates to a different record in the control.| ||在单击某一页导航按钮时，但在 控件处理分页操作之前发生。Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but before the control handles the paging operation. 此事件通常用于取消分页操作。This event is often used to cancel the paging operation.| > [!NOTE] > 以编程方式更改属性时，不会引发这些事件 。These events are not raised when you change the property programmatically. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来启用控件中的分页功能 。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to enable the paging feature in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewAllowPaging#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewAllowPaging/CS/formviewallowpagingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewAllowPaging#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewAllowPaging/VB/formviewallowpagingvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 启用分页后 (当 属性设置为 `true`) 时，会自动在控件中显示一个名为页导航行的附加 行。When paging is enabled (when the property is set to `true`), an additional row called the pager row is automatically displayed in the control. 页导航行包含的控件允许用户导航到其他记录，并且可以显示在控件的顶部和底部，或者同时显示在控件的顶部和底部。The pager row contains controls that allow the user to navigate to other records, and can be displayed at the top, the bottom, or both the top and bottom of the control. 使用 属性以编程方式访问 表示控件中的底部页导航行的对象 。Use the property to programmatically access the object that represents the bottom pager row in the control. > [!NOTE] > 只有 控件在事件中创建了底部页导航行后，属性才可用 。The property is available only after the control creates the bottom pager row in the event. 当你需要以编程方式操作底部页导航行时（例如，添加自定义内容时），通常会使用此属性。This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the bottom pager row, for example when adding custom content. 对属性所做的任何修改都 必须在 创建表示底部页导航行的对象之后执行; 否则， 控件将覆盖所有更改。Any modification to the property must be performed after the object that represents the bottom pager row has been created; otherwise, the control overwrites any changes. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性访问在控件底部显示的页导航行 。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to access the pager row displayed at the bottom of a control. 然后，将用其他内容更新页导航行。The pager row is then updated with additional content. summary.span: 获取或设置单元格的内容和单元格的边框之间的空间量。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可控制单元格的内容和单元格的边框之间的间距。Use the property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border. 指定的填充量将添加到单元格的四个边。The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of the cell. 控件的同一列中的所有单元格 都具有相同的宽度。All cells in the same column of a control have the same width. 填充量适用于最宽的单元格，列中的所有其他单元格都将调整为该单元格的宽度。The padding amount is applied to the widest cell and all other cells in the column are adjusted to that cell width. 同样，同一行中的所有单元格都具有相同的高度。Similarly, all cells in the same row have the same height. 填充量适用于行中最高的单元格，该行中的所有其他单元格都将调整为该单元格的高度。The padding amount is applied to the tallest cell in the row and all other cells in the row are adjusted to that cell height. 无法指定单个单元大小。Individual cell sizes cannot be specified. 若要调整单元格之间的间距，请使用 属性。To adjust the spacing between cells, use the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果未设置此属性，则使用浏览器的默认值。When this property is not set, the default value of the browser is used. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来指定单元格的内容和单元格的边框之间的间距大小。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the amount of spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可确定 控件是处于编辑、插入还是只读模式。Use the property to determine whether the control is in edit, insert, or read-only mode. 下表列出了不同的模式值。The following table lists the different mode values. |“模式”Mode|说明Description| |----------|-----------------| |`FormViewMode.Edit`|控件处于编辑模式，这允许用户更新记录的值。The control is in edit mode, which allows the user to update the values of a record.| |`FormViewMode.Insert`|控件处于插入模式，这允许用户向数据源添加新记录。The control is in insert mode, which allows the user to add a new record to the data source.| |`FormView.ReadOnly`|控件处于只读模式，这是正常的显示模式。The control is in read-only mode, which is the normal display mode.| 当单击 "新建"、"更新"、"插入"、"删除" 或 "取消" 命令按钮时，此值通常由控件自动设置。This value is normally set automatically by the control when the New, Update, Insert, Delete, or Cancel command button is clicked. 当 控件更改模式以响应操作时，将引发下表中的事件。When the control changes modes in response to an action, the events in the following table are raised. 这允许您创建一个自定义事件处理程序，该处理程序在发生事件时执行相应的例程。This allows you to create a custom event handler that performs the appropriate routine when the event occurs. |事件Event|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||当 控件更改模式时，但在模式更改后发生。Occurs when the control changes modes, but after the mode changes. 此事件通常用于在控件更改模式时执行任务 。This event is commonly used to perform a task whenever the control changes modes.| ||在 控件更改模式时，但在模式更改之前发生。Occurs when the control changes modes, but before the mode changes. 此事件通常用于取消模式更改。This event is commonly used to cancel the mode change.| **注意** 使用方法以编程方式更改模式时，不会引发这些事件 。**Note** These events are not raised when you change the mode programmatically by using the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来确定 控件是处于编辑、插入还是只读模式。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine whether the control is in edit, insert, or read-only mode. 如果用户在控件处于 "编辑" 中时尝试导航到另一个记录 ，则会取消分页操作。If the user attempts to navigate to another record while the control is in edit more, the paging operation is canceled. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来指定在 执行更新、插入或取消操作后控件是返回到编辑、插入还是只读模式。Use the property to specify whether the control returns to edit, insert, or read-only mode after an update, insert, or cancel operation is performed. 默认情况下， 控件将返回到只读模式; 但是，您可以 通过将此属性设置为适当的值，使控件处于 "编辑" 或 "插入" 模式。By default, the control returns to read-only mode; however, you can keep the control in edit or insert mode by setting this property to the appropriate value. 下表列出了不同的模式值。The following table lists the different mode values. |“模式”Mode|说明Description| |----------|-----------------| |`FormViewMode.Edit`|控件处于编辑模式，这允许用户更新记录的值。The control is in edit mode, which allows the user to update the values of a record.| |`FormViewMode.Insert`|控件处于插入模式，这允许用户向数据源添加新记录。The control is in insert mode, which allows the user to add a new record to the data source.| |`FormViewMode.ReadOnly`|控件处于只读模式，这是正常的显示模式。The control is in read-only mode, which is the normal display mode.| 当 控件具有单一用途（例如仅用于插入或编辑记录）时，通常使用此属性。This property is commonly used when the control has a single purpose, such as only to insert or edit records. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性 在更新操作后使控件处于编辑模式。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to keep a control in edit mode after an update operation. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件基于属性) 指定 (控件的当前模式，为数据行呈现不同的模板 。The control renders a different template for the data row based on the current mode of the control (specified by the property). 下表显示了用于每个模式的模板。The following table shows which template is used for each mode. |模式Mode|模板已呈现Template rendered| |----------|-----------------------| |编辑Edit|| |插入Insert|| |只读Read-only|| 当 控件处于编辑模式时，使用属性定义数据行 (UI) 的用户界面。Use the property to define your own user interface (UI) for the data row when the control is in edit mode. 编辑项模板通常包含输入控件，以便用户更新现有记录的值，以及用于更新记录和取消更新操作的命令按钮。The edit item template usually contains the input controls for the user to update the values of an existing record, as well as command buttons to update the record and to cancel the update operation. 若要指定自定义模板，请先 `` 在控件的开始和结束标记之间放置标记 。To specify the custom template, first place `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然后，你可以在开始标记和结束标记之间列出模板的内容 `` 。You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `` tags. 通过使用双向绑定表达式，你可以将字段与输入控件相关联。By using a two-way binding expression, you can associate a field with an input control. 这允许 控件在编辑模式下自动在关联的输入控件中显示原始字段值。This allows the control to automatically display the original field value in the associated input control in edit mode. 当更新记录时，控件将 自动从关联的输入控件中提取更新的字段值。When a record is updated, the control automatically extracts the updated field value from the associated input control. 有关双向绑定表达式的详细信息，请参阅 [绑定到数据库](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178361(v=vs.100))。For more information on two-way binding expressions, see [Binding to Databases](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178361(v=vs.100)). 若要创建执行内置 "取消" 和 "更新" 操作的命令按钮，请在模板中添加一个 "命令按钮" 控件，并将其 `CommandName` 属性设置为下表中列出的值之一。To create command buttons that perform the built-in cancel and update operations, add a command button control to the template with its `CommandName` property set to one of the values listed in the following table. |命令按钮类型Command button type|CommandName 值CommandName value| |-------------------------|-----------------------| |取消Cancel|退出"Cancel"| |更新Update|时更新"Update"| 可以通过使用属性来控制项模板的外观 。You can control the appearance of the item template by using the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在编辑模式下为数据行定义自定义模板。The following example demonstrates how to define a custom template for a data row in edit mode. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件处于编辑模式时，使用属性控制数据行的外观 。Use the property to control the appearance of the data row when a control is in edit mode. 当 控件处于编辑模式时，数据行显示属性指定的用户定义的内容 。When the control is in edit mode, the data row displays the user-defined content specified by the property. 此属性是只读的;但是，您可以设置 它返回的对象的属性。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以使用下列方法之一以声明方式设置属性：The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - 在窗体的控件的开始标记中放置一个属性 `Property-Subproperty` ，其中 `Subproperty` 是对象的属性 (例如 `EditRowStyle-ForeColor`) 。Place an attribute in the opening tag of the control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `EditRowStyle-ForeColor`). - ``在控件的开始标记和结束标记之间嵌套元素 。Nest an `` element between the opening and closing tags of the control. 还可以以编程方式设置属性 `Property.Subproperty` ， (例如 `EditRowStyle.ForeColor`) 。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `EditRowStyle.ForeColor`). 常见设置通常包括自定义背景色、前景色和字体属性。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性 在控件处于编辑模式时为数据行指定自定义样式。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom style for a data row when a control is in edit mode. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是一个帮助器方法，该方法由 控件调用以检索数据行中声明的每个字段的值。The method is a helper method called by the control to retrieve the values of each field declared within the data row. 由于数据行基于当前模式显示不同的模板，因此此方法仅检索在与当前模式相对应的模板中声明的字段值。Because the data row displays a different template based on the current mode, this method retrieves only the field values declared in the template that corresponds to the current mode. 下表显示了可用的模式和相应的模板。The following table shows the available modes and the corresponding templates. |模式Mode|模板Template| |----------|--------------| |插入Insert|| |编辑Edit|| |只读Read-only|| 您可以使用参数指定提取的值是否包含键字段 `includeKeys` 。You can specify whether the extracted values include the key field or fields by using the `includeKeys` parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置或属性时，在控件的底部显示脚注行 。The footer row is displayed at the bottom of the control when the or property is set. 使用 属性以编程方式访问 表示脚注行的对象。Use the property to programmatically access the object that represents the footer row. > [!NOTE] > 只有 控件在事件中创建了页脚行后，属性才可用 。The property is available only after the control creates the footer row in the event. 当你需要以编程方式操作脚注行时（例如，添加自定义内容时），通常会使用此属性。This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the footer row, for example when adding custom content. 在 呈现控件之后，必须对属性进行任何修改 ; 否则， 控件将覆盖所有更改。Any modification to the property must be performed after the control has been rendered; otherwise, the control overwrites any changes. 若要控制脚注行的样式，请使用 属性。To control the style of the footer row, use the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性以编程方式在事件期间修改脚注行的属性 。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically modify the properties of the footer row during the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置或属性时，在控件的底部显示脚注行 。The footer row is displayed at the bottom of the control when the or property is set. 使用 属性可控制控件中脚注行的外观 。Use the property to control the appearance of the footer row in a control. 此属性是只读的;但是，您可以设置 它返回的对象的属性。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以使用下列方法之一以声明方式设置属性：The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - 在窗体的控件的开始标记中放置一个属性 `Property-Subproperty` ，其中 `Subproperty` 是对象的属性 (例如 `FooterStyle-ForeColor`) 。Place an attribute in the opening tag of the control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `FooterStyle-ForeColor`). - 在 `` 控件的开始标记和结束标记之间嵌套元素 。Nest a `` element between the opening and closing tags of the control. 还可以以编程方式设置属性 `Property.Subproperty` ， (例如 `FooterStyle.ForeColor`) 。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `FooterStyle.ForeColor`). 常见设置通常包括自定义背景色、前景色和字体属性。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性为脚注行指定自定义样式。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom style for the footer row. summary.span: 为 控件创建页导航行。

span.span: Creates the pager row for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是由 控件调用以创建页导航行的帮助器方法。The method is a helper method called by the control to create the pager row. 它 使用 参数中包含的对象的属性创建一个包含导航控件的对象 `pagedDataSource` 。It creates a object that contains the navigation controls using the properties of the object contained in the `pagedDataSource` parameter. 然后，将单元添加到参数所指定的行 `row` 。The cell is then added to the row specified by the `row` parameter.

para.span: 扩展类时 ，可以重写此方法以创建自己的页导航行。

span.span: When extending the class, you can override this method to create your own pager row.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件基于属性) 指定 (控件的当前模式，为数据行呈现不同的模板 。The control renders a different template for the data row based on the current mode of the control (specified by the property). 下表显示了用于每个模式的模板。The following table shows which template is used for each mode. |模式Mode|模板已呈现Template rendered| |----------|-----------------------| |编辑Edit|| |插入Insert|| |只读Read-only|| 当 控件处于插入模式时，使用属性定义数据行 (UI) 的用户界面。Use the property to define your own user interface (UI) for the data row when the control is in insert mode. 插入项模板通常包含输入控件，用户可在其中输入新记录的值，以及用于插入记录和取消插入操作的命令按钮。The insert item template usually contains the input controls for the user to enter the values for the new record, as well as command buttons to insert the record and to cancel the insert operation. 若要指定自定义模板，请先 `` 在控件的开始和结束标记之间放置标记 。To specify the custom template, first place `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然后，你可以在开始标记和结束标记之间列出模板的内容 `` 。You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `` tags. 通过使用双向绑定表达式，你可以将字段与输入控件相关联。By using a two-way binding expression, you can associate a field with an input control. 插入记录后， 控件将自动从关联的输入控件提取字段值。When a record is inserted, the control automatically extracts the field value from the associated input control. 有关双向绑定表达式的详细信息，请参阅 [绑定到数据库](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178361(v=vs.100))。For more information on two-way binding expressions, see [Binding to Databases](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178361(v=vs.100)). 若要创建执行内置取消和插入操作的命令按钮，请将命令按钮控件添加到模板，并将其 `CommandName` 属性设置为下表中列出的值之一。To create command buttons that perform the built-in cancel and insert operations, add a command button control to the template with its `CommandName` property set to one of the values listed in the following table. |命令按钮类型Command button type|CommandName 值CommandName value| |-------------------------|-----------------------| |取消Cancel|退出"Cancel"| |插入Insert|&"Insert"| 可以通过使用属性来控制项模板的外观 。You can control the appearance of the item template by using the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何为插入模式下的数据行定义自定义模板。The following example demonstrates how to define a custom template for a data row in insert mode. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 控件处于插入模式时，使用属性控制数据行的外观。Use the property to control the appearance of the data row when a control is in insert mode. 当 控件处于插入模式时，数据行显示属性指定的用户定义的内容 。When the control is in insert mode, the data row displays the user-defined content specified by the property. 此属性是只读的;但是，您可以设置 它返回的对象的属性。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以使用下列方法之一以声明方式设置属性：The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - 在窗体的控件的开始标记中放置一个属性 `Property-Subproperty` ，其中 `Subproperty` 是对象的属性 (例如 `InsertRowStyle-ForeColor`) 。Place an attribute in the opening tag of the control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `InsertRowStyle-ForeColor`). - ``在控件的开始标记和结束标记之间嵌套元素 。Nest an `` element between the opening and closing tags of the control. 还可以以编程方式设置属性 `Property.Subproperty` ， (例如 `InsertRowStyle.ForeColor`) 。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `InsertRowStyle.ForeColor`). 常见设置通常包括自定义背景色、前景色和字体属性。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性 在控件处于插入模式时为数据行指定自定义样式。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom style for a data row when a control is in insert mode. summary.span: 在单击 控件中的某个按钮时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a button within a control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 单击控件中的按钮时，将引发事件 。The event is raised when a button within the control is clicked. 这使你可以提供一种事件处理方法，该方法可在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs. 控件中的按钮 还可以调用控件的某些内置功能。Buttons within a control can also invoke some of the built-in functionality of the control. 若要执行这些操作之一，请将 `CommandName` 按钮的属性设置为下表中的值之一。To perform one of these operations, set the `CommandName` property of a button to one of the values in the following table. |CommandName 值CommandName value|说明Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| |退出"Cancel"|取消编辑或插入操作，并将 控件返回到属性指定的模式 。Cancels an edit or insert operation and returns the control to the mode specified by the property. 引发 和 事件。Raises the and events.| |“Delete”"Delete"|删除当前记录。Deletes the current record. 引发 和 事件。Raises the and events.| |编辑"Edit"|将 控件置于编辑模式。Puts the control in edit mode. 引发 和 事件。Raises the and events.| |&"Insert"|将当前记录插入到数据源中。Inserts the current record in the data source. 引发 和 事件。Raises the and events.| |新西兰"New"|将 控件置于插入模式下。Puts the control in insert mode. 引发 和 事件。Raises the and events.| |分页"Page"|执行分页操作。Performs a paging operation. 将 `CommandArgument` 该按钮的属性设置为 "第一步"、"上一步"、"下一步"、"上一步" 或页码，以指定要执行的分页操作的类型。Set the `CommandArgument` property of the button to "First", "Last", "Next", "Prev", or a page number to specify the type of paging operation to perform. 引发 和 事件。Raises the and events.| |时更新"Update"|更新数据源中的当前记录。Updates the current record in the data source. 引发 和 事件。Raises the and events.| 尽管 单击上表中列出的按钮时引发事件，但建议使用表中列出的事件执行该操作。Although the event is raised when a button listed in the previous table is clicked, it is recommended that you use the events listed in the table for the operation. 对象传递给事件处理方法，该方法允许您确定所单击按钮的命令名和命令参数。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the command name and command argument of the button clicked. 若要确定命令名称和命令参数，请 分别使用和 属性。To determine the command name and command argument, use the and properties, respectively. 还可以通过使用属性访问引发事件的控件 。You can also access the control that raised the event by using the property. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 事件来处理控件中的按钮单击操作 。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to handle a button click in a control. 当用户单击 "添加" 按钮时，当前显示的项将添加到 控件中。When the user clicks the Add button, the currently displayed item is added to a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewItemCommandEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewItemCommandEventArgs/CS/formviewcommandeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewItemCommandEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewItemCommandEventArgs/VB/formviewcommandeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在控件中创建所有行后引发事件 。The event is raised after all rows are created in a control. 第一次呈现控件时，或当用户导航到另一条记录时，会发生这种情况。This can occur when the control is first rendered, or when the user navigates to another record. 你可以使用此事件来提供事件处理方法，该方法在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程，如添加或修改行的内容。You can use this event to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as adding to or modifying the contents of a row, whenever this event occurs. > [!NOTE] > 事件在 控件绑定到数据之前发生。The event occurs before the control is bound to data. 若要修改绑定字段的值，请使用 事件。To modify the value of a bound field, use the event. 您可以 分别使用、 、 或属性访问控件中的标头、表尾和页导航行 。You can access the header, footer, and pager rows in the control by using the , , , or properties, respectively. 若要访问数据行，请使用 属性。To access the data row, use the property. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 事件来更新 页导航行中包含的控件的文本。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to update the text of a control contained in the pager row. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewItemCreated#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewItemCreated/CS/formviewitemcreatedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewItemCreated#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewItemCreated/VB/formviewitemcreatedvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Occurs when a Delete button within a control is clicked, but after the delete operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 `CommandName` 单击控件中 ) 属性设置为 "delete" 的按钮 (时，控件将引发事件，但在控件删除记录后，控件将引发该按钮 。The control raises the event when a Delete button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Delete") within the control is clicked, but after the control deletes the record. 这使你可以提供一种事件处理方法，该方法执行自定义例程，如在此事件发生时检查删除操作的结果。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of a delete operation, whenever this event occurs. 对象将传递到事件处理方法，该方法允许你确定受影响的记录数以及可能已发生的任何异常。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the number of records affected and any exceptions that might have occurred. 若要确定受删除操作影响的记录数，请使用 属性。To determine the number of records affected by the delete operation, use the property. 使用 属性可确定是否发生了异常。Use the property to determine whether any exceptions occurred. 还可以通过设置属性，指示是否已在事件处理方法中处理异常 。You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event-handling method by setting the property. 如果要访问已删除记录的键字段和非键字段的名称/值对，请 分别使用和 属性。If you want to access the name/value pairs of the key fields and non-key fields of the deleted record, use the and properties, respectively. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 事件来确定删除操作过程中是否发生了异常。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to determine whether an exception occurred during a delete operation. remarks.format: ## Remarks (当 `CommandName` 单击控件中 ) 属性设置为 "delete" 按钮，但在 控件删除记录之前，控件引发事件。The control raises the event when a Delete button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Delete") within the control is clicked, but before the control deletes the record. 这使你可以提供一个事件处理方法，该方法在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程，如在删除记录之前验证记录。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as verifying a record before deleting it, whenever this event occurs. 对象传递给事件处理方法，该方法允许您确定要删除的记录的索引，并指示应取消删除操作。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the index of the record being deleted and to indicate that the delete operation should be canceled. 若要确定记录的索引，请使用 属性。To determine the index of a record, use the property. 若要取消删除操作，请将 属性设置为 `true` 。To cancel the delete operation, set the property to `true`. 你还可以分别使用和属性访问键字段和非键字段 。You can also access the key fields and non-key fields by using the and properties, respectively. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 事件取消删除操作。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to cancel a delete operation. summary.span: 在单击 控件中的“插入”按钮时，但在插入操作之后发生。

span.span: Occurs when an Insert button within a control is clicked, but after the insert operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件在 `CommandName` 单击控件中的 "插入" ) (按钮，但在控件插入记录后，控件引发事件 。The control raises the event when an Insert button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Insert") within the control is clicked, but after the control inserts the record. 这使你可以提供一种事件处理方法，该方法执行自定义例程，如在此事件发生时检查插入操作的结果。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of an insert operation, whenever this event occurs. 对象将传递到事件处理方法，该方法允许你确定受影响的记录数以及可能已发生的任何异常。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the number of records affected and any exceptions that might have occurred. 若要确定受插入操作影响的记录数，请使用 属性。To determine the number of records affected by the insert operation, use the property. 使用 属性可确定是否发生了异常。Use the property to determine whether any exceptions occurred. 还可以通过设置属性，指示是否已在事件处理方法中处理异常 。You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event-handling method by setting the property. 如果需要访问插入记录的值，请使用 属性。If you need to access the values of the inserted record, use the property. 默认情况下，该 控件返回到 插入操作后由属性指定的模式。By default, the control returns to the mode specified by the property after an insert operation. 若要使 控件保持在插入模式下，请将 属性设置为 `true` 。To keep the control in insert mode, set the property to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 事件来确定是否在插入操作过程中发生了异常。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to determine whether an exception occurred during an insert operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewInsertedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertedEventArgs/CS/formviewinsertedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewInsertedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertedEventArgs/VB/formviewinsertedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 `CommandName` 单击控件中的 "插入" ) 按钮，而在 控件插入记录之前，控件将引发事件 (。The control raises the event when an Insert button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Insert") within the control is clicked, but before the control inserts the record. 这使你可以提供一个事件处理方法，该方法执行自定义例程，如在每次发生此事件时，在将记录插入到数据源之前对记录的值进行 HTML 编码。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as HTML encoding the values of a record before inserting it in the data source, whenever this event occurs. 对象传递到事件处理方法，该方法允许您确定发送到控件的可选命令参数的值 ，并指示应取消插入操作。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the value of an optional command argument sent to the control and to indicate that the insert operation should be canceled. 命令参数值与 `CommandArgument` "插入" 按钮的属性相对应。The command argument value corresponds to the `CommandArgument` property of the Insert button. 如果 `CommandArgument` 设置了 "插入" 按钮的属性，请使用 属性来确定命令参数的值。When the `CommandArgument` property of the Insert button is set, use the property to determine the value of the command argument. 若要取消插入操作，请将 属性设置为 `true` 。To cancel the insert operation, set the property to `true`. 您还可以通过使用属性来读取或修改新记录的字段值 。You can also read or modify the field values for the new record by using the property. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 事件来取消插入操作。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to cancel an insert operation. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件基于属性) 指定 (控件的当前模式，为数据行呈现不同的模板 。The control renders a different template for the data row based on the current mode of the control (specified by the property). 下表显示了用于每个模式的模板。The following table shows which template is used for each mode. |模式Mode|模板已呈现Template rendered| |----------|-----------------------| |编辑Edit|| |插入Insert|| |只读Read-only|| 当控件处于只读模式时，可使用属性定义数据行 (UI) 的用户界面 。Use the property to define your own user interface (UI) for the data row when the control is in read-only mode. 项模板通常包含用于显示记录字段值的控件，以及用于编辑、插入和删除记录的命令按钮。The item template usually contains controls to display the field values of a record, as well as command buttons to edit, insert, and delete a record. 若要指定自定义模板，请先 `` 在控件的开始和结束标记之间放置标记 。To specify the custom template, first place `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然后，你可以在开始标记和结束标记之间列出模板的内容 `` 。You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `` tags. 若要显示绑定到控件的数据源的字段值，请使用数据绑定表达式。To display the field values of the data source bound to the control, use a data-binding expression. 有关数据绑定表达式的详细信息，请参阅 [数据绑定表达式语法](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/676beb1d-ddfa-4153-bba8-3c86dcb7ceca)。For more information on data-binding expressions, see [Data-Binding Expression Syntax](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/676beb1d-ddfa-4153-bba8-3c86dcb7ceca). 若要创建执行内置 "删除"、"编辑" 和 "新记录" 操作的命令按钮，请向模板中添加一个 "命令按钮" 控件，并将其 `CommandName` 属性设置为下表中列出的值之一。To create command buttons that perform the built-in delete, edit, and new record operations, add a command button control to the template with its `CommandName` property set to one of the values listed in the following table. |命令按钮类型Command button type|CommandName 值CommandName value| |-------------------------|-----------------------| |删除Delete|“Delete”"Delete"| |编辑Edit|编辑"Edit"| |新建New|新西兰"New"| 可以通过使用属性来控制项模板的外观 。You can control the appearance of the item template by using the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何为只读模式下的数据行定义自定义模板。The following example demonstrates how to define a custom template for a data row in read-only mode. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 `CommandName` 单击控件中的 "更新" 按钮 (其属性设置为 "Update" ) 的按钮时，控件将引发事件，但在 控件更新记录后。The control raises the event when an Update button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Update") within the control is clicked, but after the control updates the record. 这使你可以提供一种事件处理方法，该方法执行自定义例程，如在此事件发生时检查更新操作的结果。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of an update operation, whenever this event occurs. 对象将传递到事件处理方法，该方法允许你确定受影响的记录数以及可能已发生的任何异常。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the number of records affected and any exceptions that might have occurred. 若要确定受更新操作影响的记录数，请使用 属性。To determine the number of records affected by the update operation, use the property. 使用 属性可确定是否发生了异常。Use the property to determine whether any exceptions occurred. 还可以通过设置属性，指示是否已在事件处理方法中处理异常 。You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event-handling method by setting the property. 如果需要访问已更新记录的键字段值，请使用 属性。If you need to access the key field values for the updated record, use the property. 可以分别使用和属性访问原始的和更新的非键字段 值 。The original and updated non-key field values can be accessed using the and properties, respectively. 默认情况下，该 控件返回到 更新操作后由属性指定的模式。By default, the control returns to the mode specified by the property after an update operation. 若要使 控件处于编辑模式，请将 属性设置为 `true` 。To keep the control in edit mode, set the property to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 事件来确定是否在更新操作过程中发生了异常。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to determine whether an exception occurred during an update operation. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 控件尝试在编辑、插入和只读模式之间切换时，但在模式实际更改之前，会引发事件。The event is raised when a control attempts to switch between edit, insert, and read-only mode, but before the mode actually changes. 这使你可以提供一种事件处理方法，该方法执行自定义例程，如在 此事件发生时配置特定模式的控件或取消模式更改。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as configuring the control for a specific mode or canceling the mode change, whenever this event occurs. 对象被传递到事件处理方法，该方法允许您确定控件要切换到的模式 ，确定是 由于用户取消编辑操作而引发了该事件，还是指示应取消插入操作。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the mode to which the control is switching, to determine whether the event was raised as a result of the user canceling an edit operation, or to indicate that an insert operation should be canceled. 若要确定新模式，请使用 属性。To determine the new mode, use the property. 还可以 通过将属性设置为枚举值之一，使用属性切换到备用模式 。You can also use the property to switch to an alternate mode by setting it to one of the enumeration values. 使用 属性可确定用户是否取消了编辑操作。Use the property to determine whether the user canceled an edit operation. 若要取消插入操作，请将 属性设置为 `true` 。To cancel an insert operation, set the property to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用事件在 控件转换为编辑模式时隐藏页导航行。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to hide the pager row when the control transitions to edit mode. summary.span: 处理在控件层次结构中向上传递的事件。

span.span: Handles an event passed up through the control hierarchy.

span.span: to indicate the event should be passed further up the control hierarchy; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件使用方法，以选择性地处理通过控件层次结构通过方法向上传递的事件 。The method is used by the control to optionally handle events passed up through the control hierarchy by the method. 它通过检查参数中包含的对象的属性来确定是否要处理事件 `e` 。It determines whether to handle an event by examining the properties of the object contained in the `e` parameter. 需要处理某个事件时，方法会执行相应的操作。When an event needs to be handled, the method performs the appropriate action. 其他事件将被忽略并向上传递控件层次结构。Other events are ignored and passed up the control hierarchy. 此方法指示是否在控件层次结构中通过其返回值向后传递事件。This method indicates whether to pass the event further up the control hierarchy through its return value. 控件重写此方法的基实现，以在单击控件所识别的一个按钮时执行相应的操作。The control overrides the base implementation of this method to perform the appropriate action when one of the buttons recognized by the control is clicked. 下表列出了控件识别的命令按钮 。The following table lists the command buttons that the control recognizes. |ButtonButton|CommandName 值CommandName value|说明Description| |------------|-----------------------|-----------------| |取消Cancel|退出"Cancel"|在更新或插入操作中用于取消操作并丢弃用户输入的值。Used in updating or inserting operations to cancel the operation and to discard the values entered by the user. 然后，该 控件返回到由属性指定的模式 。The control then returns to the mode specified by the property.| |删除Delete|“Delete”"Delete"|用于删除操作以从数据源中删除所显示的记录。Used in deleting operations to delete the displayed record from the data source. 引发 和 事件。Raises the and events.| |编辑Edit|编辑"Edit"|用于更新操作，使 控件处于编辑模式。Used in updating operations to put the control in edit mode. 为数据行显示在属性中指定的内容 。The content specified in the property is displayed for the data row.| |插入Insert|&"Insert"|在插入操作中用于尝试使用用户提供的值在数据源中插入新记录。Used in inserting operations to attempt to insert a new record in the data source with the values provided by the user. 引发 和 事件。Raises the and events.| |新建New|新西兰"New"|在插入操作中用于将 控件置于插入模式中。Used in inserting operations to put the control in insert mode. 为数据行显示在属性中指定的内容 。The content specified in the property is displayed for the data row.| |页面Page|分页"Page"|用于在分页操作中表示执行分页的页导航行中的按钮。Used in paging operations to represent a button in the pager row that performs paging. 若要指定分页操作，请将 `CommandArgument` 按钮的属性设置为 "下一步"、"上一步"、"First"、"Last" 或要导航到的页面的索引。To specify the paging operation, set the `CommandArgument` property of the button to "Next", "Prev", "First", "Last", or the index of the page to which to navigate. 引发 和 事件。Raises the and events. **注意：** 此类型的按钮通常仅在页导航模板中使用。**Note:** This type of button is typically used only in the pager template.| |更新Update|时更新"Update"|用于更新操作，尝试使用用户提供的值更新数据源中显示的记录。Used in updating operations to attempt to update the displayed record in the data source with the values provided by the user. 引发 和 事件。Raises the and events.| `true`当处理其中一个按钮时，此版本的方法将返回。This version of the method returns `true` when one of these buttons is handled. 有关事件冒泡的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about event bubbling, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 方法由 控件调用以引发 事件。The method is called by the control to raise the event. 在扩展类时，控件开发人员通常会使用此方法 。It is generally used by control developers when extending the class. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 方法由 控件调用以引发 事件。The method is called by the control to raise the event. 在扩展类时，控件开发人员通常会使用此方法 。It is generally used by control developers when extending the class. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 获取显示数据源中的所有记录所需要的总页数。

span.span: Gets the total number of pages required to display every record in the data source.

value.span: 基础数据源中的项数。

span.span: The number of items in the underlying data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 启用分页功能后 (当 属性设置为 `true`) 时，请使用 属性来确定基础数据源中的总记录数。When the paging feature is enabled (when the property is set to `true`), use the property to determine the total number of records in the underlying data source. > [!NOTE] > 由于 控件一次只显示一个记录，因此此值对应于显示数据源中的每个记录所需要的总页数。Because the control displays only one record at a time, this value corresponds to the total number of pages required to display every record in the data source. 在进行数据绑定之前，此值不准确。This value is not accurate until after data-binding occurs. 若要确定基础数据源中的当前记录的索引，请使用 属性。To determine the index of the current record from the underlying data source, use the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来确定控件中显示的记录总数。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the total number of records displayed in the control. summary.span: 当 属性的值在分页操作后更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property changes after a paging operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当页导航按钮 (在 `CommandName` 控件中 ) 属性设置为 "Page" 的按钮时，控件将引发事件，但在 控件处理分页操作之后。The control raises the event when a pager button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Page") within the control is clicked, but after the control handles the paging operation. 这使你可以提供一种事件处理方法，该方法可在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs. > [!NOTE] > 以编程方式设置该属性时，不会引发此事件 。This event is not raised when you programmatically set the property. 页导航按钮通常位于控件的页导航行中 。Pager buttons are usually located in the pager row of a control. 此事件通常用于使 控件与控件同步， 或 在分页操作后设置控件的行为。This event is often used to synchronize a control with a control or to set the behavior of the control after a paging operation. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示了 当用户导航到另一条记录时，如何使用事件将返回到只读模式。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to return the to read-only mode when the user navigates to another record. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewPageIndexChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewPageIndexChanged/CS/formviewpageindexchangedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewPageIndexChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewPageIndexChanged/VB/formviewpageindexchangedvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 当 属性的值在分页操作前更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property changes before a paging operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当页导航按钮 (`CommandName` 控件中 ) 属性设置为 "Page" 的按钮时，但在 控件处理分页操作之前，控件引发事件。The control raises the event when a pager button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Page") within the control is clicked, but before the control handles the paging operation. 这使你可以提供一种事件处理方法，该方法可在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程，如取消分页操作。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the paging operation, whenever this event occurs. > [!NOTE] > 以编程方式设置该属性时，不会引发此事件 。This event is not raised when you programmatically set the property. 页导航按钮通常位于控件的页导航行中 。Pager buttons are usually located in the pager row of a control. 对象将传递到事件处理方法，该方法允许你确定用户所选择的页的索引，并指示应取消分页操作。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the index of the page selected by the user and to indicate that the paging operation should be canceled. 若要确定用户选择的页的索引，请使用 属性。To determine the index of the page selected by the user, use the property. 若要取消分页操作，请将 对象的属性设置 为 `true` 。To cancel the paging operation, set the property of the object to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 事件取消分页操作。The following example demonstrates how to use the event to cancel a paging operation. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewPageEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewPageEventArgs/CS/formviewmodeeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewPageEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewPageEventArgs/VB/formviewmodeeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: A reference to the that allows you to set the properties of the pager buttons in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可控制控件中页导航行的设置 。Use the property to control the settings of the pager row in a control. 如果在将属性设置为) 的情况下 (启用分页功能，则会显示页导航行 `true` ，并包含允许用户导航到控件中的不同记录的控件。The pager row is displayed when the paging feature is enabled (when the property is set to `true`), and contains the controls that allow the user to navigate to the different records in the control. 此属性是只读的;但是，您可以设置 它返回的对象的属性。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性 `Property-Subproperty` ，其中 `Subproperty` 是对象的属性 (例如 `PagerSettings-Mode`) 。The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `PagerSettings-Mode`). 还可以以编程方式设置属性 `Property.Subproperty` ， (例如 `PagerSettings.Mode`) 。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `PagerSettings.Mode`). 常见设置通常包括页导航行的显示模式以及导航控件的自定义文本或图像。Common settings usually include the pager row's display mode and custom text or images for the navigation controls. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性指定页导航行的属性。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the properties of the pager row. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可控制控件中页导航行的外观 。Use the property to control the appearance of the pager row in a control. 如果在将属性设置为) 的情况下 (启用分页功能，则会显示页导航行 `true` ，并包含允许用户导航到控件中的不同页面的控件。The pager row is displayed when the paging feature is enabled (when the property is set to `true`), and contains the controls that allow the user to navigate to the different pages in the control. 此属性是只读的;但是，您可以设置 它返回的对象的属性。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以使用下列方法之一以声明方式设置属性：The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - 在窗体的控件的开始标记中放置一个属性 `Property-Subproperty` ，其中 `Subproperty` 是对象的属性 (例如 `PagerStyle-ForeColor`) 。Place an attribute in the opening tag of the control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `PagerStyle-ForeColor`). - 在 `` 控件的开始标记和结束标记之间嵌套元素 。Nest a `` element between the opening and closing tags of the control. 还可以以编程方式设置属性 `Property.Subproperty` ， (例如 `PagerStyle.ForeColor`) 。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `PagerStyle.ForeColor`). 常见设置通常包括自定义背景色、前景色和字体属性。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性指定页导航行的样式设置。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the style settings for the pager row. span.span: The default value is null, which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果启用分页功能，则在控件中显示页导航行 (将 属性设置为 true) 。A pager row is displayed in a control when the paging feature is enabled (when the property is set to true). 页导航行包含允许用户导航到控件中的不同页的控件。The pager row contains the controls that allow the user to navigate to the different pages in the control. 您可以使用属性定义您自己的 UI，而不是使用内置的页导航行用户界面) (UI 。Instead of using the built-in pager row user interface (UI), you can define your own UI by using the property. > [!NOTE] > 设置属性时，它将覆盖内置的页导航行 UI。When the property is set it overrides the built-in pager row UI. 若要为页导航行指定自定义模板，请先 `` 在控件的开始和结束标记之间放置标记 。To specify a custom template for the pager row, first place `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the control. 然后，你可以在开始标记和结束标记之间列出模板的内容 `` 。You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `` tags. 若要控制页导航行的外观，请使用 属性。To control the appearance of the pager row, use the property. 通常，将按钮控件添加到页导航模板以执行分页操作。Typically, button controls are added to the pager template to perform the paging operations. 当 `CommandName` 单击属性设置为 "Page" 的按钮控件时，控件将执行分页操作。The control performs a paging operation when a button control with its `CommandName` property set to "Page" is clicked. 按钮的 `CommandArgument` 属性确定要执行的分页操作的类型。The button's `CommandArgument` property determines the type of paging operation to perform. 下表列出了控件支持的命令参数值 。The following table lists the command argument values supported by the control. |CommandArgument 值CommandArgument value|说明Description| |---------------------------|-----------------| |一个"Next"|导航到下一页。Navigates to the next page.| |处"Prev"|导航到上一页。Navigates to the previous page.| |1"First"|导航至第一页。Navigates to the first page.| |时间"Last"|导航至最后一页。Navigates to the last page.| |整数值Integer value|定位到指定的页码。Navigates to the specified page number.| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何定义自定义页导航模板。The following example demonstrates how to define a custom pager template. remarks.format: ## Remarks 为了使内联样式属性（如）应用于为 控件呈现的所有 html，ASP.NET 将呈现的 html 包含在 `table` 元素中。In order to make inline style properties such as apply to all the HTML that is rendered for the control, ASP.NET encloses the rendered HTML in a `table` element. 如果你不希望 `table` 呈现外部元素，请将此属性设置为 `false` 。If you do not want the outer `table` element to be rendered, set this property to `false`. 在这种情况下，如果尝试设置适用于整个控件的内联样式属性，则会引发异常。In that case, if you try to set inline style properties that apply to the whole control, an exception is thrown.

summary.span: 获取表示 控件中的数据行的 对象。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性以编程方式访问 表示数据行的对象。Use the property to programmatically access the object that represents the data row. 数据行包含不同的内容，具体取决于) 的属性指定 (当前模式下呈现的模板 。The data row contains different content based on the template rendered for the current mode (specified by the property). 您只能访问当前模式下的模板内容。You can only access the contents of the template for the current mode. 下表显示了用于每个模式的模板。The following table shows which template is used for each mode. |模式Mode|模板已呈现Template rendered| |----------|-----------------------| |编辑Edit|| |插入Insert|| |只读Read-only|| > [!NOTE] > 只有在 控件在事件中创建数据行后，属性才可用 。The property is available only after the control creates the data row in the event. 当你需要以编程方式操作数据行时（例如，添加自定义内容时），通常会使用此属性。This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the data row, for example when adding custom content. 在 控件被数据绑定后，必须对属性进行任何修改 ; 否则， 控件将覆盖所有更改。Any modification to the property must be performed after the control has been data-bound; otherwise, the control overwrites any changes. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性在事件期间访问数据行的属性 。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to access the properties of the data row during the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 控件处于只读状态 (显示) 模式时，可以使用属性控制数据行的外观。Use the property to control the appearance of the data row when a control is in read-only (display) mode. 当 控件处于只读模式时，数据行显示属性指定的用户定义内容 。When the control is in read-only mode, the data row displays the user-defined content specified by the property. 此属性是只读的;但是，您可以设置 它返回的对象的属性。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. 可以使用下列方法之一以声明方式设置属性：The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - 在窗体的控件的开始标记中放置一个属性 `Property-Subproperty` ，其中 `Subproperty` 是对象的属性 (例如 `RowStyle-ForeColor`) 。Place an attribute in the opening tag of the control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the object (for example, `RowStyle-ForeColor`). - ``在控件的开始标记和结束标记之间嵌套元素 。Nest an `` element between the opening and closing tags of the control. 还可以以编程方式设置属性 `Property.Subproperty` ， (例如 `RowStyle.ForeColor`) 。The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `RowStyle.ForeColor`). 常见设置通常包括自定义背景色、前景色和字体属性。Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性 在控件处于只读模式时为数据行指定自定义样式。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom style for a data row when a control is in read-only mode. summary.span: 获取表示在 控件顶部显示的页导航行的 对象。

span.span: Gets the object that represents the pager row displayed at the top of a control.

value.span: 一个 ，表示 控件中的顶部页导航行。

span.span: A that represents the top pager row in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 启用分页后 (当 属性设置为 `true`) 时，会自动在控件中显示一个名为页导航行的附加 行。When paging is enabled (when the property is set to `true`), an additional row called the pager row is automatically displayed in the control. 页导航行包含的控件允许用户导航到其他记录，并且可以显示在控件的顶部和底部，或者同时显示在控件的顶部和底部。The pager row contains controls that allow the user to navigate to other records, and can be displayed at the top, the bottom, or both the top and bottom of the control. 使用 属性以编程方式访问 表示控件中的顶部页导航行的对象 。Use the property to programmatically access the object that represents the top pager row in the control. > [!NOTE] > 只有 控件在事件中创建了顶部页导航行后，属性才可用 。The property is available only after the control creates the top pager row in the event. 当你需要以编程方式操作顶部页导航行时（例如，添加自定义内容时），通常会使用此属性。This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the top pager row, for example when adding custom content. 对属性所做的任何修改都 必须在 控件绑定到数据后执行; 否则， 控件将覆盖所有更改。Any modification to the property must be performed after the control has been bound to data; otherwise, the control overwrites any changes. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性访问在控件顶部显示的页导航行 。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to access the pager row displayed at the top of a control. 然后，将用其他内容更新页导航行。The pager row is then updated with additional content. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewTopPagerRow#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewTopPagerRow/CS/formviewtoppagerrowcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewTopPagerRow#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewTopPagerRow/VB/formviewtoppagerrowvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 控件处于编辑模式时，使用 方法以编程方式更新数据源中的当前记录。When the control is in edit mode, use the method to programmatically update the current record in the data source. 如果需要从控件之外（如 页面上的不同控件）更新当前记录，通常会使用此方法。This method is commonly used when you need to update the current record from outside of the control, such as from a different control on the page. > [!NOTE] > 调用此方法时，控件必须处于编辑模式; 否则， 将引发。The control must be in edit mode when this method is called; otherwise, an is thrown. 若要指定在更新操作之前是否执行页验证，请使用 `causesValidation` 参数。To specify whether page validation is performed before the update operation, use the `causesValidation` parameter. 调用此方法还会引发 和 事件。Calling this method also raises the and events. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 方法以编程方式更新 数据源中控件中的当前记录。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to programmatically update the current record in a control in the data source.
